roleset.name: tempt, entice

example.name: induced action
example.text: Sterling's firm tone, combined with a steady opening on Wall Street, also tempted some investors to come back to the market, dealers said.
example.arg: Sterling's firm tone, combined with a steady opening on Wall Street,
to come back to the market,

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Paiwan poet Monaneng has written : " The hundred - pacer is dead ; / They 've put it in a big transparent medicine jar / With ' aphrodisiac ' on the label , / To tempt men wandering among back street red lights . / The hundred - pacer of our fairytales is dead ; / We Paiwan worshipped its eggs as our ancestors , / But now they 've put it in a medicine jar / As a tool to excite urban lust . . . . "
example.arg: men wandering among back street red lights

example.name: adjectival rel: tempting
example.text: Their crimes could be violent , like robbery . Acts of crime could also involve drug dealing , which [*] is tempting when the only other option would be to make an honest living earning minimum wage .
example.arg: when the only other option would be to make an honest living earning minimum wage

example.name: Adjectival rel: tempted
example.text: I 'm tempted to go down there myself to protest this repression of our civil rights !
example.arg: to go down there myself to protest this repression of our civil rights

example.name: arg 0 for potential manners unless there is another arg 0 present

roleset.note: TEMPT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tempt' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'tempting' based on BOLT-1; adjectival 'tempted' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, force-59. (from tempt.01-v)
TEMPTATION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to tempt.01. Tempt.01 is a member of VN classes amuse-31.1 and force-59. Framed by Katie. (from temptation.01-n)
TEMPTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tempted.01-j)
TEMPTING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tempting.01-j)
